name: I'm not a robot (laame)
description:
Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Esc - Pause
  • M - Toggle Music
  • N - Toggle SFX
  • Ctrl+Z - Restart Game
Abilities
  • Pistol - damages finite amount of closest enemies, can crit
  • Static Field - damages all enemies in area
  • Magnet - pulls in exp tokens
  • Crit Modifier - increases crit chance
  • Cooldown Modifier - reduces cooldown of abilities
  • Damage Modifier - increases damage
  • Area Modifier - increases area of effect for abilities
Made with
  • Godot Engine v3.4.3
  • Aseprite
Assets used
  • 26 Animated PixelArt Robots by Mounir Tohami
  • godot-sfxr plugin
Music
  • "Ludum Dare 28 - Track 1" by abstractionmusic.com
